description: Creamy, spicy, and delicious vegan buffalo chicken mac and cheese is made with whole food ingredients and jackfruit for the chicken.
keywords: dairy-free Buffalo mac and cheese, vegan Buffalo mac and cheese
name: Vegan Buffalo Chicken Mac and Cheese
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups raw cashews (soaked overnight or boiled for 15 minutes. See note.)
1/3 cup nutritional yeast (do not use active, rising, or brewerâ€™s yeast.)
1/2 cup buffalo sauce (use more if you like it really spicy. Make our recipe or use vegan store-bought.)
1/2 cup vegan ranch dressing (use our recipe or vegan store-bought.)
1/2 cup plant milk (do not use coconut milk. Feel free to add more if you like a thin cheese sauce.)
16 ounce young green jackfruit in water
1 jalapeno pepper (seeded, cored, and finely chopped)
Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles according to the instructions on the box.
